message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  It's a fair price considering the market value, and it's the most I'm able to offer at this time.

Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 simply isn't enough for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,000, which still gives you a good price and allows me to make a fair profit. Remember, I have another buyer ready to pay $15,000, so this is a great opportunity for you. Let's finalize this deal at $13,000.
